Name: Departure.
About the game: TIMEOUT. A dreaded prospect on a cold and rainy night. The toys scattered around the room are sure to help you pass the time. Journey to faraway lands, through the power of your imagination . Discover lost knowledge and keep an eye out for the elusive clue here and there. Use your inquisitive nature to find solutions and secrets that can help you on your quest to crack the door's five locks and be free of your confinement in this simple, yet unorthodox, adventure, puzzle solver.
